thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.com.au
thread.title: Kara S

author: Kara S
title: Kara S
text: Recently ordered birthday invitations for my partners 30th, was really easy to do, affordable and came with envelopes included in the price. Invitations looked great - very happy! I even ordered the wrong size initially but was given an option to cancel them straight away without having to call anyone, money was refunded in a timely manner too! Will definitely recommend to others, and use again.
